title: Meta-analytic studies of the glial cell marker TSPO in psychosis – a question of apples and pears?: A commentary on ‘Neuroinflammation in schizophrenia: metaanalysis of in-vivo microglial imaging’ by Marques et al. – ERRATUM
abstract: Meta-analytic studies of the glial cell marker TSPO in psychosis – a question of apples and pears?: A commentary on ‘Neuroinflammation in schizophrenia: metaanalysis of in-vivo microglial imaging’ by Marques et al. – ERRATUM - Volume 49 Issue 9
